org.sercho.masp.space
Interface SpaceProvider<E extends TupleSpace<?>>

Type Parameters:
E - type of the spaces
public interface SpaceProvider<E extends TupleSpace<?>>

SpaceProvider manages some TupleSpaces and gives access to them.

Author:
Grzegorz Lehmann

Method Summary
 java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIDsOfSpaces()
          getIDsOfSpaces returns a list of IDs of all spaces provided by this provider.
 E getSpace(java.lang.String spaceID)
          getSpace returns a space with a given ID.
 

Method Detail

getIDsOfSpaces

java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getIDsOfSpaces()
getIDsOfSpaces returns a list of IDs of all spaces provided by this provider.

Returns:
Set<String> - IDs of all spaces

getSpace

E getSpace(java.lang.String spaceID)
getSpace returns a space with a given ID.

Parameters:
spaceID - ID of the space
Returns:
E - space with ID spaceID or null if no such space exists
